TopicTitle: Any idea where kerbals at war might have been filmed?

Articles.Content:
anyone remember this?

well i was just wondering for curiosity's sake where this might have been filmed.  a picture on the map screen would be preferred but anything will do.

A long long time ago (way before 0.9 I would say) in a place far far away (around the old KSC by the look of it). But that's just my guess, I did not make that video.

 

Keep in mind planets have changed a lot over time, sometimes for the better, and sometimes for the worse. I still miss the old Duna, was much more interesting than what we have now, btw.

7 minutes ago, Dafni said:

A long long time ago (way before 0.9 I would say) in a place far far away (around the old KSC by the look of it). But that's just my guess, I did not make that video.

 

Keep in mind planets have changed a lot over time, so﻿metimes for the better, and sometimes for the worse. I still miss the﻿ old Du﻿na, was muc﻿h more inte﻿resting than w﻿hat we h﻿ave now, btw.

 

thanks, i rarely go outside kerbins sphere of influence so i dont know what duna used to look like but i do miss the lake between the mountains and the ksc (i got the game in version 0.17)
This question about the work of a fan has been moved to Fan Works.

it might just MIGHT be filmed at kerbin

now for real probably near the ksc i dont imagine the autor driving a tank to the other site of kerbin
